dialogue.name: Unknown
dialogue.text: If you're reading this, the developer forgot to assign a dialogue here.

dialogue.name: Unknown
dialogue.text: If you're reading this, the dialogue here failed to load.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Research Notes

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Introducing, the health-up serum!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Take one sip and you'll find yourself more healthy than before!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: We promise it won't turn your body to mush!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: How to slap jellies

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Step 1: Walk up to a jelly.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Step 2: Use [Left Mouse Button].

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Step 3: Marvel at the might of your jelly slapping abilities.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Teleporter Instructions

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Stand atop the teleporter and press [E].

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: You will be instantly teleported to the other side.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: In the unlikely event that you teleport without your internal organs...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Please seek a medical doctor right away.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Subject No. 8 Research Notes

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: No. 8 survived for a full 5 minutes yesterday before being incapacitated

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Currently a new record from 4.5 minutes

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Let's all show our support for No. 8!

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: What exactly are they doing here?

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: It's looks like a memo

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Jerry said the funniest thing yesterday.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: He said that one of the jellies looked a lot like our buddy who disappeared the other day.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: He even suggested that the guys up top are turning researchers into jellies.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: He cracks me up every time.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: It's a shame we'll never see him again.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Please stop piling boxes everywhere

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: It's getting harder to move around the lab

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Plus, someone could easily hide behind them where the guards cannot see

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: For the sake of our security, clean up after yourselves

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: One-way shortcut to the Water Labs

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Remember, press E to teleport

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: You should hold your breath

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: A basic principle of fluids

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: If you have a low enough density...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: ...buoyant forces will allow you to float upward in the surrounding fluid

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: So naturally, we made floating water.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And now you can float while you float!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Give it a try!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Hold [Space] to jump higher

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Because when something barely within reach, you just gotta try a little harder

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Words to live by

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: No Swimming

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Subject No. 8 Research Notes

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: No. 8 loved coming to the Water Labs

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: I remember him smiling as he rode through the floating water columns

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And then one day, he couldn't escape one of the columns...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And he drowned...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: So we changed the rules...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And now No. 8 can no longer drown

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: To Warehouse

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: It's heavily guarded lol

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: To Water Labs

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Attention all staff

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: As a reminder, in any controlled experiment, researchers must not interfere with the results

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: We do not condone falsification of any data whatsoever

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And that means that all test subjects are to remain in the lab at all times

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Anyone caught assisting a test subject in escaping...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: ...will be punished severely

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Diving chamber

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Now with more teleporters!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: You might be wondering why this water looks green

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Well my friend, I must warn you...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: This water is actually REAL ACID!!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: LOL JK

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: The lab has been in an uproar since some of the researchers started supporting No. 8

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Many of our colleagues have disappeared and security has been increased

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: We certainly don't support No. 8 and we definitely don't want him to survive!

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Subject No. 8 Research Notes

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: No. 8 loved to jump on some of the platforms around the lab

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: He seems to like jumping around a lot

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Then he fell over and hurt himself

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And so we changed the rules again

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: And now he can survive a fall from any height

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: Are these really research notes?

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Lift out of order

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Can someone fix it already?!

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: It's looks like a note from one of the guards

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: Why did they stick me here? On a platform surrounded by floating water?

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: I have a fear of drowning...

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: STICKY KEEEEEEEEEEEYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYSSSSSSSSSSSS

dialogue.name: PLayer
dialogue.text: There's a bunch of obfuscated text here.

dialogue.name: PLayer
dialogue.text: I can barely make you what they were trying to say.

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: The sign is covered with jelly.

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: To warehouse

dialogue.name: Sign
dialogue.text: As you'd expect, it's heavily guarded
